sections.title: Our Vision
sections.content: We believe the purpose of being alive is being loving and happy. The world is a loving place and we remind the people around us of that. We encourage everyone to pass on the joy: A smile goes a long way =)

quote.quote: Be the Change you want to see in the World.
quote.author: Ghandi

videos.title: How to Change the World with Positive Social Action

sections.title: What We Do
sections.content: We focus on little activities that everyone can easily do in their community or neighborhood. We show you how you can bring the people around you together and spread a positive vibe. Through little acts of kindness we are planting seeds for the happy world we all want to live in.

quote.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
quote.author: Mark Twain

cards.title: Activities
cards.description: We invite positive, friendly and pro-active Focallocaller anywhere in the World to meet you and create Positive Action together. Meet other people who want to make World a better place and have fun doing it!

cards.title: Positive Action Days
cards.description: Join thousands of others in cities all across the World, creating buttlerfly effects of positive energy all across our planet. Let's celebrate the joy of being alive together!

cards.title: Positive Psychology
cards.description: To change the world around you, you first have to change the World within you. One task every day for 30 days is usually enough to form a long term habit which will increase your mental health and happiness.
